properties.description: The home FL-Islandora repository.
properties.title: Owning institution

properties.description: The institution submitting the object.
properties.title: Submitting institutition

properties.description: A logo to display with objects in addition to the logo of the owning institution.
properties.title: Other logo

properties.description: The name by which the resource is formally known.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: "IID" is the local item identifier.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource. Valid IID characters are limited to alphanumeric, underscore, hyphen, period, and parentheses.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: The type of identifier. Suggested values include, but are not limited to, those specified in Standard Identifier Source Codes.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: An entity primarily responsible for the intellectual content of the resource.
properties.title: Creator

properties.description: The nature or genre of the resource.
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: The date the object was created. Prefer for born-digital and unpublished or informally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. If there is a date range, use the Full MODS form.
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: The date the object was issued. Prefer for formally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. If there is a date range, use the Full MODS form.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: The entity responsible for making the original resource available.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: City, State where resource was published.
properties.title: Place

properties.description: Physical description of the resource; its extent (number and duration) and/or dimensions (size).
properties.title: Physical description

properties.description: The language of the intellectual content of the resource.
properties.title: Language

properties.description: A summary, abstract, scope and content note, or other description.
Describes the intellectual content of the resource.
properties.title: Description

properties.description: Information about aspects of the resource besides its intellectual content. Specific kinds of notes with note type or display labels (e.g. "Bibliography" or "Thesis" notes) will not display on this form; use the Full MODS form instead.
properties.title: General note

properties.description: Used to describe component parts of a compound object.
properties.title: Compound object note

properties.description: The focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Topical subject

properties.description: The geographic focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Geographic subject

properties.description: Enter in format: latitude / longitude
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: General information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages. For specific restrictions on access (e.g. "Restricted: cannot be viewed until 2010") use the Restriction on Access note.
properties.title: Use and Reproduction

properties.description: Specific restriction on access (e.g. "Restricted: cannot be viewed until 2010"). For general information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages, use the "Use and reproduction" note.
properties.title: Restriction on access

properties.description: The institution or repository that holds the resource or where it is available.
properties.title: Physical location

properties.description: Select "PURL" if URL is a PURL. Use "not a PURL" otherwise.
properties.title: Type of URL

properties.description: The URL or PURL of the resource.
properties.title: URL

properties.description: Anchor text to display instead of the URL or PURL.
properties.title: URL Display Label

properties.description: A public note that will display after the URL or PURL.
properties.title: URL note
